references: Stephan Wolfram, The Mathematica Book, 4th Edition, Cambridge University Press, section 3.2.10 'Special Functions', page 772, 1999.
mathematica: Range[18]!CoefficientList[ Series[ -ProductLog[ -x], {x, 0, 17}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 23 2005 *)a[ n_] := If[ n < 0, 0, (n + 1)! SeriesCoefficient[ -ProductLog[-x], {x, 0, n}]] (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 07 2012 *)
author: Gero Burghardt (gerogoestohollywood(AT)yahoo.de), Jun 05 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 09 2001
